description:
Shanks visits Whitebeard with a serious request, Franky and Iceberg begin construction on a ship for the Straw Hats, and news spreads of the events at Enies Lobby.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shanks Makes a Move! The Linchpin to the Reckless Era
Shanks Ugoku! Bousou Suru Jidai e no Kusabi
Shanks entre en scène ! Prémice d’une ère qui déraille
Ход Шанкса! Ключ к бушующей эпохе
シャンクス動く! 暴走する時代への楔
